app.title: Ex-Friend
app.subtitle: A guided conversation to process friendship breakups with care and intention.

startScreen.title: Ex-Friend
description: Friendship make-ups are soooo awkward and intimidating. It feels impossible to break the ice and have a meaningful conversation that leaves both sides feeling heard. Till now.
Take turns asking and answering each question. For this specific pack, we recommend that both players answer each card. Optional: have tissues and wine ready.
You may decide to mend the friendship or go your separate ways. Regardless of the outcome, you'll know you did your part.
1. Avoid viewing conflict as something you can win. No one wins unless the conflict is resolved on both sides.
2. Avoid using the phrases "you always" or "you never."
3. While playing, actively look for points of agreement rather than points of division.
4. When someone shares how you've hurt their feelings, believe them. It doesn't mean you're a bad person. View it as an opportunity to grow.
5. Friendships don't need to last forever to be successful. It's okay to grow in different directions. It's okay to love each other from a distance.

endScreen.title: Will you be my friend again?
endScreen.subtitle: YES or NO

questions.question: BOTH PLAYERS EXPLAIN THE SITUATION FROM THE OTHER PERSON'S POV TO THE BEST OF YOUR ABILITY.
TAKE 3 MINUTES TO EXPLAIN YOUR POINT OF VIEW WITH NO INTERRUPTIONS. BOTH PLAYERS.
WILDCARD: BOTH PLAYERS WRITE DOWN YOUR MOST COMMON DEFENSE MECHANISM AND HOW IT HOLDS YOU BACK THE MOST. READ OUT LOUD.
WHAT IS ONE THING YOU WISH YOU COULD HAVE DONE DIFFERENTLY?
DID YOU SET ANY UNFAIR EXPECTATIONS ON ME?
WHEN DID YOU FEEL MOST DISTANT FROM ME?
FINISH THE SENTENCE: SOMETHING I'M WORKING ON IS ______
WILDCARD: REMINDER EVERYONE'S TRUTH LOOKS DIFFERENT.
WAS THERE ANYTHING YOU WERE GOING THROUGH THAT I DIDN'T SEE?
IT WAS VERY CLEAR OUR FRIENDSHIP WASN'T THE SAME WHEN
WHEN DO YOU MISS ME MOST?
WILDCARD: APOLOGIZE FOR SOMETHING (BIG OR SMALL).
WHAT'S A LIFE UPDATE THAT I'VE MISSED?
WHAT'S SOMETHING ABOUT OUR FRIENDSHIP THAT YOU DON'T GET FROM ANYONE ELSE?
